SMASH THROUGH AUGUST WITH A FREE HAMMER ATTACHMENT!

FREE Hammer Attachment with Your Kubota 3.5T Excavator Hire

Hire our Kubota 3.5T Excavator this month and receive a FREE hammer attachment - ideal for trenching, demolition, and tight-access sites.


Promo valid until August 31

Limited slots available - Book early!

Call Us: 1800 426 637

TRANSPORT JUST GOT HEAVIER

10-Wheeler Truck Now Available!


We've expanded our transport fleet with a powerful 10-wheeler truck. It's built to deliver and move heavy equipment faster and more efficiently across NSW. Whether it's an excavator, roller, or loader, this new addition ensures quicker response times and improved logistics for your hire needs.


✔ Fully GPS-tracked for accurate delivery updates
✔ Operated by licensed and experienced drivers
✔ Reliable pickups and drop-offs for any site


Now making your equipment hire experience even smoother and more dependable.
Book Your Next Move

FEATURED EQUIPMENT FOR HIRE

Excavator Dry Hire


From compact 1.7T for tight-access areas to 74T units for large-scale bulk excavation. All units are fully maintained, site-ready, and available for short or long-term hire.
Dry Hire Excavators

QUICK ACCESS WITH QR-ENABLED MACHINES

Every Hammer Hire machine now includes a QR code.

Your team can scan to instantly access:

✔ Full equipment specs
✔ Operator and safety manuals
✔ Maintenance instructionsuctions


No paperwork. No delays. Just the info you need, right when you need it.

CHECK OUR LATEST BLOG

Avoid These Common Mistakes When Hiring Excavation and Civil Machinery

Save time, avoid costly errors, and hire the right machine for the job.
Read More
Download Brochure

Sincerely,

The Hammer Hire Team
